Name: 91 Days (14P)
Description: During the Prohibition era, in the Lawless district the law has no power, the mafia rule the streets, and the illegally made liquor flows freely. Avilio lived in this district, but after the murder of his family, he went into hiding.

Name: A Paladin's Guide to the Galaxy
Description: Join the paladins of Voltron as they teach you the ins and outs of surviving in space, as well as answer questions some may have about being the defenders of the universe!

Name: A Silent Voice: Sign & Speak
Description: Known as Koe no Katachi in Japan, A Silent Voice features a deaf protagonist and extensive use of Japanese sign language. The rookie manga presents accurate deaf representation to the world.

Name: A Song of Ice and Fire / Game of Thrones
Description: Come discuss popular and obscure fan theories with other fans. Compare the books versus the television show and participate in a general Q&A.

Name: Advanced Cosplay Electronics
Description: We'll be talking about some of the basics in electronic circuitry for use in cosplay, with insight on all the tips and tricks of making a functional circuit in your costumes.

Name: Akiba's Trip (14P)
Description: An urban legend describes monsters known as "bagurimono" lurk in dark corners of Akihabara, the paradise of anime. When Tamotsu encounters one, he is almost killed but saved at the last moment by a girl named Matome.

Name: All About Fantasy Cosplay
Description: Best place to get elf ears? What's with lace front wigs? Is leatherworking as intimidating as it looks? And how DO you play the Game of Thrones? Answers are here, noble cosplayer!

Name: All Out!! (AP)
Description: On his first day in Kanagawa Prefectural High School, Kenji meets the tall Sumiaki during a game of rugby. Kenji strikes a friendship with Sumiaki, and soon joins the rugby club.

Name: Amiibo tournament BRAWL IN THE FAMILY
Description: Got an amiibo with sick moves ? Well then... SHOW ME YOUR MOVES! The amiibo Tournament is back and ready for another year of hard knocks - there will be stock Amiibos available too so everyone can play!

Name: AMV Audio Swap II
Description: What happens when you take an existing AMV and add a different audio track to it? Sometimes random chance makes AMV's even more awesome, and what you end up with may be unpredictable and even more entertaining.

Name: AMV Contest
Description: We are pleased to bring this beloved event back yet again for Otafest 2017! Come and experience the full spectrum of entertainment as editors from all over the world compete in several categories. Pick up a ballot and get ready to choose the Audience's Best in Show. On Sunday morning, we'll be showing all our non- finalist entries, as well as all winners.

Name: AMV Hell Marathon
Description: Feel like you're missing AMV Hell in your life? We present some of the best segments of AMV Hell and its many imitators, from the 13 years of its existence, marathon style.

Name: AMV Mortal Combat 2.0
Description: Come join the fun as we pit AMV's to fight it out in the video arena. Cheer on your favorites and help decide the fate of AMV's in mortal combat!

Name: AMV Sing, Clap & Stomp-a-long
Description: Come and join in as we Sing-A-Long, Clap-A-Long and Stomp-A-Long to AMVs!

Name: AMV Trailers
Description: Anime parody trailers have spawned a whole new class of AMVs, and we've got an hour full of them! These trailers might even be more interesting than the originals!

Name: AMVs Are Trying To Sell You Stuff
Description: If you thought television had too many ads, just wait till you see these what these AMV's are selling!

Name: An Idiot's Guide to Anime
Description: Having been exposed to less than 2 hours of anime in his life, join Brendan the Otafest Medic as he provides his insight and commentary on clips, specially hand selected by the Otafest AV staff. Revel in his relative innocence and naive interpretation of the surprise clips presented to him.

Name: An Introduction to Kenji Miyazawa
Description: Explore the life of Japan's beloved poet and fairytale writer Kenji Miyazawa through anime based on his works, including a dramatic reading of one of his stories.

Name: Anime Caption This
Description: Pictures, screenshots, cels, photobombs, and so much more. Get ready to caption some hilarious and awkward pictures in Anime Caption This!

Name: Anime Dragon's Den
Description: Think you got a great idea for an anime series? Pitch it to the Dragons; an elite panel of Investors, who, in reality have zero credentials whatsoever. Only THEY stand between you and your dream venture… but only if the concept is so good…or so bad?

Name: Anime Hentai Superfight
Description: Come try out superfight - see what kind of risqué powers your favorite anime and hentai characters get involved in!

Name: Anime Jeopardy Contest
Description: Want to test your knowledge for fun and prizes and prove how much of an otaku you really are? Get chosen from the audience and compete for the right to be called the ultimate Anime Jeopardy champion!

Name: Anime Name Game
Description: It's the anime version of Celebrity Name Game, with some fun twists.

Name: Anime Name That Tune
Description: Think you can name your favourite anime openings and endings? Well then test your reflexes and wits against others for prizes in the ultimate musical showdown!

Name: Anime Scene It!
Description: I'll take a potato chip and EAT IT. If you can recognize an anime scene like that see if you can crush the competition as you try complete against others to identify anime scenes the fastest.

Name: Anime Things
Description: Things you wouldn't expect to find in a Gundam. Things Speed Racer also has for accessories. Even Things you never suspected Naruto to use as a weapon. Come check out all our Anime Things!

Name: Anime Through the Ages
Description: Like history and anime? Want to learn about the shifts in demographics, anime booms, and the history of anime conventions? Then this is the panel for you!

Name: Aoi Hanoo [Live Action] (AP)
Description: Kazuhiko has enrolled at the Osaka University of Arts with the goal of being the best animator in the country. His classmates include the likes of Hideaki Anno, Hiroyuki Yamaga and Takami Akai – the founding members of Gainax.

Name: Artist Spotlight with Birdy
Description: See how Birdy puts together his style, from every line and curve to hues and shades.

Name: ARTISTS HATE HIM: 1 evil trick to git gud designing OCs (do not steal) and make better ART!
Description: While art and design is seen as one of those things as having "no shortcuts ", there are, in fact many techniques and dare I say, shortcuts, to becomming a better artist and designer! Let's all learn from each other's failures and have an active discussion on the little things that we can do (tonight) for the big gains in our OCs/ fanart/original works!

Name: Ask Jerry Anything
Description: Something you wanna ask Jerry that may have nothing to do with anime at all? Now's the time!

Name: Awesomecore AMVs
Description: Come and sit back and watch the world's best AMV's... OK, so these might be a bit strange, twisted and mind blowing, but they are never short of AWESOME! Did we mention we also have some awesome prizes to give away?

Name: Basics of Armour 101
Description: A basic introductory panel explaining and outlining basic ideas, details and simple ways to start your way into building cosplay armour!

Name: Basics of Japanese Language and Culture
Description: Teaches the basics of Japanese such as pronunciation, basic sentences and vocabulary, prefixes, numbers, body language (such as proper bowing and what NOT to do with chopsticks) and regional holidays.

Name: Best of Anime According to AMV's
Description: One of the most popular AMV blocks ever! So we've proven time and time again that AMV's never lie and ALWAYS tell us what an anime is all about... right? Join in the fun as we take some of the best ones and sprinkle in some new ones for an hour of amusement.

Name: Board Games at Night with Pips Boardgame Café
Description: As part of Otafest's 24-hour experience, night owls looking to play board games can visit the Pips 24-Hour Lounge on the Marriott's second floor between 12am – 6am for board gaming provided by Pips Board Game Cafe! We'll also have anime marathoning nearby all night long when you want to watch more than participate!

Name: Board Games at Night with Pips Boardgame Café
Description: As part of Otafest's 24-hour experience, night owls looking to play board games can visit the Pips 24-Hour Lounge on the Marriott's second floor between 12am – 6am for board gaming provided by Pips Board Game Cafe! We'll also have anime marathoning nearby all night long when you want to watch more than participate!

Name: Board Games with Fallcon
Description: The Anime Board Game Room is designed for attendees to take a break from the hustle from cosplay and vendors to panels and showings! There are a lot of anime and Asian culture-inspired board games out in the market today, and this is a chance for folks to come in, sit down and learn one of these games! These events are hosted in association with Fallcon – check their website at fallcon.com!

Name: Board Games with Fallcon
Description: The Anime Board Game Room is designed for attendees to take a break from the hustle from cosplay and vendors to panels and showings! There are a lot of anime and Asian culture-inspired board games out in the market today, and this is a chance for folks to come in, sit down and learn one of these games! These events are hosted in association with Fallcon – check their website at fallcon.com!

Name: Can YOU Survive the Imperial Demon Army
Description: Do you think you have what it takes to survive the Imperial Demon Army from Seraph of the End? Compete head to head to become a part of the Imperial Demon Army and take down the vampires!

Name: Canada 150, Roof Top Fireworks Extravaganza!
Description: For the first time ever, we're excited to provide an exclusive rooftop patio for our attendees. Come watch the Canada Day fireworks with Otafest with a special musical guest providing the soundtrack! Open to all ages, the Marriott Rooftop Patio will be providing food, nonalcoholic drink, and alcoholic beverages (ID required). The rooftop patio can be accessed through the Sunalta Room in the Marriott. The patio is available to Otafest attendees only! Enjoy a great view of the Canada Day fireworks! Be warned – if we hit capacity, we may have to turn folks away!

Name: Cards Against Otafest
Description: Cards Against Otafest is BACK… AGAIN…?? Let's lock a bunch of nerds in a room and play a large-scale game of Cards Against Humanity, The results will be fun, humorous, and horrifying.

Name: Channel A
Description: Based on the hit party game, Channel A Studios is changing their broadcast lineup again. Find out what new series are on the horizon and help pitch new ideas for the next hit anime!

Name: Comedy AMVs
Description: Is it any wonder why it's the most popular AMV Category? Join us for a full block of comedy awesomeness! Get your seats early, they fill up fast!

Name: Comedy on the Edge
Description: Want more comedy videos and are looking for more mature content that just can't be shown during the day? You've come to the right block!

Name: Con Horror Stories: Fellowship of the Creeps
Description: Convention Horror Stories has returned! Con Horror Stories is a panel to share stories about weird, funny, creepy, and downright ridiculous things that occur during conventions. Relax and have fun!

Name: CON-SURVIVAL 101
Description: Curious about the convention scene? Look no further; we've got some tips on how you can get the most out of your weekend shenanigans!

Name: Convention Horror Stories
Description: Got a convention horror story you'd like to share? Wanna hear the daring tales of others? Then this is the panel for you! Just remember to bring your ID!

Name: Cosplay Dating Game
Description: Find the love of your life in our cosplay dating panel! Answer questions from our lovely bachelorettes and pray you get picked!

Name: Cosplay Fashion Show & Skit Contest
Description: This is always one of the biggest events of any convention, and certainly the most popular here at Otafest! Come and see the results of everyone's creativity as they pay tribute to their favourite anime characters through costumes!

Name: Cosplay for Broke Folks
Description: Wanna cosplay but think it's too expensive? Well it doesn't have to be! Learn some tips from two people who've been there and done that.

Name: Cosplay Music Videos (CMVs)
Description: Step into the world of Cosplay Music Videos. From storytelling to mind candy effects, take a journey on the other side of music video fandom.

Name: Cosplay Showcase: Craftsmanship Contest
Description: Otafest proudly presents the Cosplay Showcase! For those cosplayers out there who want to show off their costumes but don't necessarily want to do so on-stage during the Cosplay Fashion Show, this event is for you! Here, our judges will look at your costume in detail. No prior experience is necessary as we have separate categories for beginners and experts. Winners will be announced at the Awards Ceremony!

Name: Cosplay Weapons and props 101
Description: Ever wondered how to make a certain prop, or why your prop was fine at one convention only to be banned at the next? Join us to discuss and learn about props and conventions.

Name: Crossplay Pageant
Description:
The Crossplay Pageant is a 2-round contest for crossplayers._x000D_
Round 1 will have an introduction and a Q&A from our judges followed by a Talent Show; Round 2 is a mystery round involving improv!

Name: Disney Sing-Along!
Description: Come one, come all, and sing along with your favorite Disney songs!

Name: Disney Through AMV's
Description: Like anime? Like Disney? What if anime was mixed with Disney? Come and join us in a panel of AMV's through Disney music. Come see zeroes becoming heroes, tales as old as time, and a magical bear-cat trying to get two people to kiss, and more!

Name: Drifters (14P)
Description: In a parallel world mankind is locked in an endless war with the monsters of the land. In our world, when warriors of great renown and skill perish they are sent to that world to influence the course of that war – they are known as drifters.

Name: EDM Concert - WTCHDCTR
Description: DJ WTCHDCTR starts off the 2017 dance at Otafest by influencing classical Japanese sounds with hard-hitting EDM rhythms that will replace your heartbeat with sick beats and show your love for a local Calgary talent on Friday night!

Name: Exhibitor Hall - Artist Alley, Autographs, Concession, Photo Booth, Sketch Drive, Vendors
Exhibitor Hall - Artist Alley, Autographs, Concession, Photo Booth, Sketch Drive, Vendors
Fake Artist goes to Otafest
Description: Based on a popular Japanese game, players take turns collectively drawing a picture but one doesn't know what the drawing is supposed to be. Can the fake artist hide the fact or will they get caught?

Name: Fantastic Fights (14P)
Description: A collection of fantastic and iconic fights spanning many genres and styles of animation arranged for your viewing pleasure.

Name: Fantastic Fights (14P)
Description: A collection of fantastic and iconic fights spanning many genres and styles of animation arranged for your viewing pleasure.

Name: Fantastic Fights (14P)
Description: A collection of fantastic and iconic fights spanning many genres and styles of animation arranged for your viewing pleasure.

Name: Fire Emblem Wars 2; The Reckoning
Description: Welcome back to another Waifu/Husbando war with Robin and Orochi as your hosts! Support your faves, learn all about characters and maybe play a few games as well!

Name: Five Nights at Freddy's - Theories and Timelines
Description:
New Job? Check. Pizza? Check? An array of psychotic haunted animal robots trying to kill you? Of course!_x000D_
Come find out what Freddy's is all about and discuss what theorists think really happened!

Name: Flip Flappers (AP)
Description: Papika and Cocona hold the keys to open the door. When the two girls meet, their adventures in a different time and different overlapping dimension called "Pure Illusion" begin.

Name: Flying Witch (AP)
Description: Every witch, when they reach the age of sixteen, is supposed to move out on their own and be independent… But Makoto is a bit air headed, clumsy and prone to getting lost; so she's moving in with relatives in the county instead.

Name: Foam Sword Tournament
Description: Display your strength and wits! Gear will be provided, random participants can fight after the main events - first come, first serve, and may the best triumph!

Name: Forza 6 Leaderboard Tournament
Description:
Ready to go all out? Burn rubber in our Forza 6 leaderboard tournament presented by Microsoft! Take a seet in the official Forza Chair and steer your way to victory with the Official Forza Wheel! Prize for the winner of each round! Drop in whenever you'd like, you don't need to have played in previous rounds to compete.

# of Players: Drop-in (Each player can participate in multiple rounds, but can only win once per day.)

Tracks (Randomized):
- Lime Rock Park
- Road Atlanta
- Monza

Car (Randomized):
- Ford GT 2017
- Hummer H1 Alpha 2006
- Ferrari #1 Scuderia Ferrari 641 1990

Description:

- Hummer H1 Alpha 2006
- Ferrari #1 Scuderia Ferrari 641 1990

Name: Free Play Card Gaming Based on Space
Friday Night Dance - James Landino
Description: You've heard his music in videogames and webseries and now you can enjoy his work LIVE! Headlining our Friday Night Dance, James Landino is going to bring only the top-scoring videogame music this weekend. It's a time attack to see just how many moves you can pop in.

Name: Full moon Festival: An Introduction to Tsukiuta
Description:
Join us in the moonlight festival where we introduce you to the world of Tsukiuta! _x000D_
A series about EVEN MORE idols that collabs with famous vocaloid producers and each representing the 12 months.

Name: Fuuka (AP)
Description: Yuu is the new boy in town and finds himself drawn to Fuuka. Discovering that they both love the same band and his bass playing compliments Fuuka's singing voice, they start a band.

Name: Gender and You
Description: Come join as we discuss a variety of transgender characters in fictional media, the importance of representation, and how it affects us.

Name: Gladzy: Armorcrafting with Worbla and Eva Foam
Description: Gladzy Kei talks about the process behind creating your own armor cosplay from scratch, starting with reference photos, gathering materials, making your own patterns, all the way up to final fabrication.

Name: Gladzy: Designing Your Own Cosplay
Description: Armored princesses, Pokémon gijinkas, and more! Gladzy Kei talks about the process behind re-imagining existing characters with your own creative twist.

Name: Got Milk? ~ A HaiQ&A story
Description: Come to our Haikyuu panel! Q&A and games for prizes - it'll be all GWAH and BOW and stuff!!

Name: Halo 5 Free For All Tournament
Description:
Are you a master chef? Well, the chief doesn't care! There's no time for cooking when you're busy pummeling your opponents into the ground and reigning supreme with some cool Microsoft swag!

# of Players: 4 (Pre-registration and/or drop-in)
Number of Rounds: 3
Time Limit per round: 15 Minutes
Game Type: Slayer
Respawn: 5 Seconds
Maps: Random

Name: Halo 5 Free For All Tournament
Description:

Name: Hangout Space
Description: The SunAlta Rooftop Patio is a casual, Otafest-exclusive hangout place on the Marriott's second floor for you to take a load off in between panels and shopping! The patio is a fantastic place to grab a bite to eat, take a break, and chill with your friends! Come by and enjoy the view; watch all of Stephen Ave pass by below! Music! Food! Beverages! All ages welcome! Over 18? We'll also have liquor available! Please enjoy responsibly; if overly intoxicated, you will be asked to leave. Don't forget your ID!

Name: Hangout Space
Description: The SunAlta Rooftop Patio is a casual, Otafest-exclusive hangout place on the Marriott's second floor for you to take a load off in between panels and shopping! The patio is a fantastic place to grab a bite to eat, take a break, and chill with your friends! Come by and enjoy the view; watch all of Stephen Ave pass by below! Music! Food! Beverages! All ages welcome! Over 18? We'll also have liquor available! Please enjoy responsibly; if overly intoxicated, you will be asked to leave. Don't forget your ID!

Name: Hangout Space (Beer Available)
Description: The SunAlta Rooftop Patio is a casual, Otafest-exclusive hangout place on the Marriott's second floor for you to take a load off in between panels and shopping! The patio is a fantastic place to grab a bite to eat, take a break, and chill with your friends! Come by and enjoy the view; watch all of Stephen Ave pass by below! Music! Food! Beverages! All ages welcome! Over 18? We'll also have liquor available! Please enjoy responsibly; if overly intoxicated, you will be asked to leave. Don't forget your ID!

Description: The SunAlta Rooftop Patio is a casual, Otafest-exclusive hangout place on the Marriott's second floor for you to take a load off in between panels and shopping! Name: Hangout Space
Description: The SunAlta Rooftop Patio is a casual, Otafest-exclusive hangout place on the Marriott's second floor for you to take a load off in between panels and shopping! The patio is a fantastic place to grab a bite to eat, take a break, and chill with your friends! Come by and enjoy the view; watch all of Stephen Ave pass by below! Music! Food! Beverages! All ages welcome! Over 18? We'll also have liquor available! Please enjoy responsibly; if overly intoxicated, you will be asked to leave. Don't forget your ID!

Name: Hentai East and West
Description: How has hentai influenced the Eastern and Western culture? Discuss how hentai's impact has it changed how we perceive and partake of adult content.

Name: Hetalia World Conference
Description: Speed running games, quizzes, and Ask The Countries! A fun and engaging panel for any Hetalia fan!

Name: Husbando Hour
Description: An anime and videogame-based game show where participants must compete for their favourite "Husbandos", rising to the top and claiming the title of of "Ultimate Husbando" for prizes!

Name: Idol Conversation
Description: What is an Idol? If you've ever asked yourself this question, look no further for the answers you seek.

Name: Idol Incidents (AP)
Description: The politicians and political parties of Japan are no longer able to govern or represent the people. Rising to the challenge, Idol groups take up the roles of government and work to the better the country that adores them.

Name: Interviews with Monster Girls (AP)
Description: Tetsuo is a teacher working at Shibasaki High School and specializes in the physiological study of demi-humans – vampires, succubus and snow women. Unfortunately, demi-humans aren't very common so he hasn't actually met one before.

Name: Introduction to Crossplay
Description: Introduction to crossplay and different ways to go about it!

Name: Introduction to Ensemble Stars
Description: Do you love idols and spending all your time playing mobile games? Then Ensemble Stars may be the game for you! Join two of the shining stars of Yumenosaki to learn more about the series and more fun!

Name: Inu-Brothers Q&A
Description: Come join Inuyasha and Sesshoumaru in a Q&A! Ask the brothers about their adventures and their lives before, during, and after their feudal fairytale, or dare the doggy duo to perform a trick or two!

Name: Iron Cosplay Scanvanger Hunt
Description: Feeling creative? Come make a cosplay out of random supplies with your team! Send your cosplayer on a scavanger hunt and see just how well your cosplay holds up!

Name: Izetta the Last Witch (14P)
Description: Long ago the White Witch saved the kingdom of Elystadt from being conquered. Now on the brick of war, the princess is despritely searching for allies to fend off an invasion when she meets a witch named Izetta on a train.

Name: J-Rock Concert - Pingame
Description: It's Otafest 2017's first musical act of the year: rocking out with Ryuma and Hide of PinGamE! Calgary welcomes this freshly-minted indie duo as they bring their tremendous electronic rock sound to North America for the first time on Friday evening. They'll bring the noise, you bring the moves!

Name: Jackbox Games with Otafest
Description: Let's play party videogames with the Otafest crew! Whether it's trivia, mad libs, or straight-up deceit, it's all about getting the most points for the WIN!

Name: Japanification Identification
Description: We've all seen the funny and weird commercials that come out of Japan at times but the question is: “Can you identify the product by ad content alone?”

Name: Join Us: Ouran High School Host Club!
Description: Join us! Come enjoy some mini games, re-enactions, trivia, and truth or dare with none other than your favourite hosts while savouring some warm drinks and delicious sweets!

Name: Just Dance, Passport, and Device Bar
Description: Hang out at the Microsoft booth to play some games, check out the tech, and just chill with your friends! There may be prizes! ;)

Name: Just Dance, Passport, and Device Bar
Description: Hang out at the Microsoft booth to play some games, check out the tech, and just chill with your friends! There may be prizes! ;)

Name: K-Pop Random Dance Play
Description: K-Pop? At my anime convention… again?! Started at Animethon, we have now made our way to Otafest! Come join us for a fun hour filled with a whole lot of dancing!

Name: Kingdom Hearts Trivia
Description: Think you know everything about Kingdom Hearts? Come on down and pit yourself against other fans.

Name: Kobayashi's Dragon Maid (AP)
Description: Overworked and drunk, Kobayashi stumbles into the forest and saves a dragon on the verge of death with nowhere to go. After drinking a bottle of sake with the dragon, they decide it will live with her as a maid.

Name: Korean Martial Arts Through History
Description: More than just modern taekwondo, Korea has a deep and fascinating martial history. Learn about the roots of Korean martial arts, how they changed through history, and discover other modern Korean arts

Name: Kpop 101
Description: For new Korean pop music fans having trouble figuring out what the heck is going on or older fans looking for a new group: We're here to help you!

Name: Kpop Crash Course 2.0
Description: Its time to dust off those dancing shoes again! Its back! Get ready to experience some more k-pop, and if dance isn't your thing? Don't worry! Come, watch, and listen to some of your favorite songs!

Name: Late night Karaoke
Description: Sing your heart out in late night Karaoke! Support Otafest's charity! What do you have to lose?

Name: Let's Talk Twitch with FeralWife & GradLifeGaming AKA Drunk Gaming
Description: Twitch is an awesome platform for the gaming community to connect. Join these streamers for a Q&A session ALL about Twitch.

Name: LIGHT NOVELS 101: AN INTRODUCTION TO LIGHT NOVELS
Description: What's a light novel? Interested to find out another source for anime other than manga and games? Come on by and we'll show you the ropes.

Name: Lights, Camera, Action!
Description: Come check out some of our favorite action AMVs!

Name: Living and Teaching in Japan
Description: Jessica has spent one year living and teaching English in Japan. Are you curious about doing the same? Do you like hearing stories from those who have lived abroad? This is the panel for you!

Name: Lolita Fashion 101
Description: Interested in Lolita fashion? Come learn more about the style and the secret life of a Lolita.

Name: Maid Matsuri
Description: Join in the festivities and come to the Matsuri! Play festival games with us and your friends for a chance to win prizes! If you are looking for a snack, there are Japanese snacks and drinks available for you to indulge in as well. If you're looking for a dose of cute, you can grab some cute merchandise lovingly handmade by our Maid & Butler Cafe members!

Name: Meet & Greet Pingame!
Description: Get up close and personal with the dynamic duo and get your selfies and autographs!

Name: Meet Reika in the Exhibitor Hall
Meet Reika in the Exhibitor Hall
Meet Reika in the Exhibitor Hall
Meet Reika in the Exhibitor Hall
Minami Kamakura High School Girls Cycling Club (AP)
Description: After moving from Nagasaki to Kamakura, Hiromi decides to start riding her bicycle to school every day. Being out of practice she struggles with the ride but, luckily, there are people ready to help her get better at it.

Name: Mix and Mingler
Description: Start the summer off right by mingling with some amazing people who love Japanese culture as much as you!

Name: Mob Psycho 100 (AP)
Description: Mob is a quiet unassuming boy who only wants to live a normal everyday life, a perfectly achievable goal if not for his immense psychic powers. Normally able to keeps his powers subdued, when his emotions peak things tend to explode.

Name: Monster hunter open season!
Description: Come swing by and hunt with your fellow hunters from across Alberta!

Name: Nefariously Bad Fanfic Theatre
Description: Last time, we ruined your childhoods and destroyed your perception of the Teletubbies forever. Join us for another round of horribly written fanfiction.

Name: New Game! (AP)
Description: After graduating high school Aoba Suzukaze immediately got a job with Eaglejump Games, the studio that produced her favorite game. Now she has a lot to learn if she wants to become a game developer.

Name: North American VA Round Table
Description: Otafest's voice acting guests discuss topics and take your questions about the industry!

Name: ODD… (14P)
Description: Does watching, let alone liking, this series put me on some kind of list? If not, it should. Who am I kidding, I'm already on it.

Name: On the Mic Voice Over Adventure 1
Description: Ever wondered what it is like to actually dub an anime? Join seasoned voice over professionals in an interactive panel in which you and room participants will learn the basics of dubbing. Participation of attendees is mandatory!

Name: One Punch Man
Description: Come chat about the the popular anime series One-Punch Man and learn about the manga and webcomic!

Name: Open Gaming + Competitive Video Game Tournament
Description:
Open Gaming
<

Name: Open Gaming + Competitive Video Game Tournament
Description:
Register for the Smash Tournament by Friday June 30 at https://smash.gg/OtafestAssault2017

In conjunction with Super Smash Bros. University and The Fighting Game Community of Calgary, Otafest is pleased to offer four cash-pot gaming tournaments for Smash Brothers Melee, Smash Brothers Wii U! Please check smash.gg/tournament/otafest-assault-2017 for full tournament details, and check out the links below to watch LIVE online! twitch.tv/ssbuniversity twitch.tv/ZyrisTV twitch.tv/otafest

Name: Opening Ceremonies
Description: Come join us as we kick off Otafest 2017! Come and see what's in store this year, meet our guests, and start the party off with a BANG!

Name: Otafest Idol
Description: It's one thing to sing along with your favourite theme song sitting at home, but it's quite another thing to perform it in front of an entire audience of anime fans! Come and watch as aspiring singers perform a variety of anime, video game, and J-pop songs. Who will be crowned the Otafest Idol champion of 2017?

Name: Otafest @ Night
Description: Based on the hit Comedy Central show @Midnight, anime and social media come together for a hilarious show of unsuspected surprises, funny pictures and crazy videos. Laugh and have lots fun @Night.

Name: Otafest Podcast Panel
Description: It's the return of the Otafest Podcast crew featuring an Otafest special guest. Join us as we record the finale for season 2 with you as part of our live studio audience!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Battle Royale
Description: Have you ever wondered which of our gym leaders were the strongest? Come watch as our gym leaders duke it out in a four-way, free-for-all tournament! Laud the victors! Humiliate the defeated! Learn their moves so you make take them down in the Pokémon League.

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Berry Picking
Description: Gotta collect 'em all! Race against other trainers to gather more berries then the rest! Your Pokémon will change their minds of what berry they're craving - how fast can you react!? Biggest berry feast wins!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Conquest
Description: In far away lands, Pokémon are used for war and conquest. Form a grand alliance that can wage war against other armies of Pokémon! advance and conquer the battle field to assume dominance!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Pokemon Snap
Description: Want to make National Pokégraphic? Think you're the best Poképhotographer out there? Come challenge other snappers with Pokémon Snap for the N64! take your best shot and the highest score wins!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Runway Madness
Description: Our smash hit returns! Come put your fashion skills to the test, pick your Pokémon partner, give them the greatest fashion designs you can come up with, and walk the runway in front of judgmental, well, judges!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Smash Bros. Tournament
Description: Come check out our special version of Super Smash Bros. Brawl, retrofitted with all Pokémon (and a few other surprises!) Choose your Pokémon and brawl it out over several matches, and prove you're the best trainer on a brand-new battleground!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - VGC Tournament
Description: As a separate event from the Pokémon League (but in the same room!), we are happy to present you with a Pokémon Video Game Championship event! Following the official 2017 Pokémon Video Game Championships rules and regulations, this tournament will truly put your trainer skills to the test!

Name: Otafest Pokemon League - Z Move Dance Off
Description: It's time to get down and show your moves! Challenge our gym leaders, your friends, or new trainers to a dance off! Bust out your best Z-Move to get your Pokémon pumped!

Name: Otafest: The Abridged Series
Description: Seasoned abridger, DoktorApplejuce, a top ten finalist in Team Four Star's 2016 abridging competition, is here with a host of other abridgers to guide you into the world of abridged parodies.

Name: Otaku High- Web Series Pilot Screening and Q & A
Description: This panel is a screening for the locally-produced web series pilot of Otaku High. The screening will be followed by a Q&A with series creator Eric Stroppel.

Name: Overwatch Training Camp
Description:
Throughout this panel, we'll be playing different drama/improv games led by your favourite Overwatchinstructors for prizes!_x000D_
Get your fighting face on, we're all soldiers now.

Name: Pokemon Clinic: Learn how to Play / Free Play
Pre-registration for Friday Card Gaming Events
Description: We'll be playing Yu-Gi-Oh!, Card fight!! Vanguard, Weiss Schwarz, Force of Will, and Dragon Ball Z! Come learn to play, or join a tournament if you already do!

Name: Pre-registration for Saturday Card Gaming Events
Description: We'll be playing Yu-Gi-Oh!, Card fight!! Vanguard, Weiss Schwarz, Force of Will, and Dragon Ball Z! Come learn to play, or join a tournament if you already do!

Name: Puns and Determination
Description: A Fun,Q & A panel based around Undertale with games and prizes. (and possibly memes)

Name: Q&A With Carolina Ravassa
Description: What's it like to be the voice of Sombra? Ask away!

Name: Q&A With Jerry Jewell
Description: A question & answer session with Funimation director & actor, Jerry Jewell!

Name: Q&A With the Runaway Guys
Description: Game sensation The Runaway Guys are here to chat with Otafest about all things gaming: speed runs, Let's Plays, YouTube comment horror stories and more! Join Calgary local Proton Jon, alongside Chuggaconroy and NintendoCapriSun.

Name: Re:Zero -Starting Life in Another World From Zero- (14P)
Description: Subaru is an ordinary high school student who is lost in an alternate world. Rescued by a beautiful, silver-haired girl, he stays near her to return the favor, but the destiny she is burdened with is more than Subaru can imagine.

Name: RFA Party
Description: Join the Mystic Messenger crew through an interactive improv adventure! Will you get the good or bad ending? It's all up to you.

Name: Rocket League Dropshot Tournament
Description:
The floor is lava! Well… sort of. It's actually just falling away. Score your way to some Microsoft swag in the Microsoft Rocket League Dropshot Tournament! Prize for the winner of each round! Drop in whenever you'd like, you don't need to have played in previous rounds to compete.

# of Players: Up to 4 (Drop-in)
Number of Rounds: 1
Time Limit per round: 5 Minutes (sudden-death overtime)

Name: Rocket League Dropshot Tournament
Description:
The floor is lava! Well… sort of. It's actually just falling away. Score your way to some Microsoft swag in the Microsoft Rocket League Dropshot Tournament! Prize for the winner of each round! Drop in whenever you'd like, you don't need to have played in previous rounds to compete.

# of Players: Up to 4 (Drop-in)
Number of Rounds: 1
Time Limit per round: 5 Minutes (sudden-death overtime)

Description:

Number of Rounds: 1

Description:

Description:

Number of Rounds: 1

Name: Rocket League Dropshot Tournament
Description:
The floor is lava! Well… sort of. It's actually just falling away. Score your way to some Microsoft swag in the Microsoft Rocket League Dropshot Tournament! Prize for the winner of each round! Drop in whenever you'd like, you don't need to have played in previous rounds to compete.

# of Players: Up to 4 (Drop-in)
Number of Rounds: 1
Time Limit per round: 5 Minutes (sudden-death overtime)

Name: RWBY world of Remnant trivia white fang take over
Description: Come enjoy some RWBY trivia with guest characters from the show. You think you know RWBY? Come and prove it !

Name: Sailor Moon Panel
Description: Join Luna, Artemis & Sailor Moon herself for the Sailor Moon Panel!

Name: Sailormoon Werewolf
Description: Sailor Moon Werewolf is back! Can the Sailor Scouts save the day or will the Negaverse rule all?

Name: Salty Bet Live (All Ages Welcome!)
Description:
You've seen Salty Bet online - watched fights, experienced the taste of glorious wins and salty tears of defeat. We do it LIFE with randomized match-ups from over 2000 characters using cold hard Monopoly cash. Who will fight? Who will win? Will you walk out a Monopoly baller or salty loser? Come find out at Salty Bet Live!

Correction: Our printed guidebook has this event listed as 18+.  It is in fact open to all ages!<

Name: Seika High's Summer Festival
Description: Welcome to Seika High! Join Misaki, Takumi, and others, play fun festival games, win prizes, plus a Q&A and photos! It's going to be a day you won't forget!

Name: Seiren (AP)
Description: The series follows the interactions of Shoichi with his female classmates while he struggles with studying for his university entrance exams and doubts about his future.

Name: Shinya Shokudo [Live Action] (AP)
Description: Open from midnight to six in the morning, with a limited menu and a cook who takes requests, the stories of the Midnight Dinner follow the lives and situations of the people who frequent it while the rest of the city sleeps.

Name: Short Form Anime (AP)
Description: A selection of ‘Short Form' series from the last year for those with short attention spans and like their anime episodes short and to the point.

Name: Shouwa Genroku Rakugo Shinjuu (AP)
Description: After seeing a Rakugo performance in prison, Kyoji has decided to dedicate his life to the art of storytelling. On the day of his release he tracks down a rakugo master and begs him to become his student.

Name: Signup & Prep for Cosplay Fashion Show & Skit Contest
Spotlight on Fullmetal Alchemist AMVs
Description: Take a journey into the ever popular world of Fullmetal Alchemist as seen through AMV's.

Name: Spotlight on Gaming Guests
Description: Drunk Gaming's siblings Alli & Justin Speed join with The Runaway Guys' Chuggaconroy, Proton Jon, and NintendoCapriSun to bring you all the insight of their shared experiences as they talk about the world of presenting videogames as a new genre of entertainment. It's a +1 to knowledge and +5 to fun!

Name: Spotlight on Pingame
Description: Learn just what it takes to become dedicated musicians in Japan and ask all the questions you've been waiting to ask!

Name: Spotlight on Reika
Description: Ask Reika all your cosplay questions in the Main Events room!

Name: Stories from the Other Side
Description: Join Brendan the Otafest Medic as he tells tales of woe and wonder from his convention adventures in Emergency Management. You'll be dazzled as he regales the audience with tales such as the mysterious zucchini.

Name: Synaptic Chaos Theatre - 18+ Only Late Night Show
Description: Synaptic Chaos Theatre goes BLUE! SCT lets loose with no-holds-barred comedy, where good taste is thrown to the curb and no topic is too taboo! Bring ID - you will be carded!

Name: Synaptic Chaos Theatre - All Ages Improv Show
Description: Get warmed up for the con with anime improv starring Synaptic Chaos Theatre! SCT presents their unique style of anime-themed comedy where you help create the scenes!

Name: Synaptic Chaos Theatre - How to Improv
Description: Join Synaptic Chaos Theatre for lessons on developing your own improv skills. Get a look at how these talented funnymen (and women) have honed their craft for over a decade!

Name: Synaptic Chaos Theatre - Late Night Dub Fight
Description: Relive moments from your favourite cartoons, videogames, movies, TV shows, and anime, in a new and hilarious light. The Late-Night Dub-Fight pits members of Synaptic Chaos Theatre and Guests against each other to find out who can “improve” classic clips by redubbing them live with their imposing improv skills. No one knows what show host Ian Horner has up his sleeves, or what the cast members will say in this all-out assault on your funny bone.

Name: The AMV Gameshow
Description: Think you know AMV's? Even if not, everybody's got a shot in this ultimate game of AMV trivia filled with chances to win awesome prizes and the glory of AMV Gameshow Champion. You do NOT want to miss this!

Name: The Ins and Outs of Visual Novels
Description: Have any idea what a visual novel is? If not, this panel is perfect for you! Learn everything you need to know about them by test piloting various scenes from popular titles, including naughty ones!

Name: The 'Joys' of Cosplay
Description: Cosplay, it's a wonderful hobby: encouraging creativity, bringing people together, forming positive communities. But sometimes you hate it, and want to complain about it, so lets complain together!

Name: The Life Cycle of an Idol
Description: Have you ever wanted to be an idol or been curious about how the Japanese idol industry works? Come learn about the lifespan of an idol, from the birth of a star to the symbolic death of graduation.

Name: This Art Club Has a Problem! (AP)
Description: Mizuki Usami is the only person in the club who wants to do art club-like activities, and constantly struggles to do so. The other members are only interested in drawing the perfect waifu, sleeping, and causing trouble.

Name: Thrown Controllers with the Runaway Guys
Description: Ready for some gaming tomfoolery? Join us in this travelling game show hosted by YouTube gaming guests The Runaway Guys!

Name: Top Anime Series!
Description: Get ready to defend your favourite anime series! Join us as we nominate, argue and discuss the top anime series of all time!

Name: Truth or Dare with Muse! : Silver Start!
Description: Come join us for questions and dancing with the idol group Muse from Love Live. Have fun with us playing truth or dare! Hosting will be the new cosplay and dance group Silver Start!

Name: Two Rooms and a Boom
Description: Two Rooms and a Boom is a party game of social interaction and deduction. Can your team win or will it go Boom?

Name: Um, Actually...
Description: Otaku are passionate about a lot of things. But there's one thing that they love more than anything else, and that is correcting people. This is "Um, Actually" the competition for nerdy corrections.

Name: Upbeat and Dance Videos
Description: This AMV block is sure to put a spring in your step and having you dancing in your seats!

Name: Urara Meirochou (AP)
Description: Every girl dreams of becoming a fortune teller in Meirochou and many flock to the city to persue their dreams. Chiya, raised in the woods by a caretaker, has come to the city with a different goal: find her mother.

Name: Video Game Jeopardy
Description: Test your knowledge of video games with Video Game Jeopardy! Covering favourite franchises like Dragon Age, Overwatch, and Final Fantasy!

Name: Video Game Scene It!
Description: Our princess is in another castle! If you think you can recognize classic and modern video game moments then come compete against others for the Video Game Scene It! title.

Name: Viktuuri Hour with YOI (Yuri On Ice)
Description: Come spend a fun filled hour with Yurio, Yuri and of course Viktor. Games, Q and A and Truth and Dare, what happens when they leave Asia to do an event in Canada?

Name: Wheel of Anime
Description: The wheel is back! This anime-themed Wheel of Fortune has returned with new puzzles and the custom wheel that will have everyone wanting to take it for a spin.

Name: World of Worbla: From Pattern to Paint
Description: An in-depth guide to using Worbla, from pattern to paint! Come by to learn the ins and outs of one of the most beloved crafting mediums in cosplay.

Name: WTF?!
Description: The glorious return of a running favorite! This year with double the fun!

Name: You Can't Say That on Yuri!!! On Ice with Jerry
Description: If Yuri on Ice wasn't constrained to a PG rating, how would Victor's quips change? Let's find out!

Name: Youtube with the Runaway Guys & Drunk Gaming
Description: Ever find yourself still awake at 3 AM wondering what YouTube wormhole you fell into? If you're a gamer, chances are you've found yourself watching a video by these guys! Join us as we chat games and YouTube with special guests The Runaway Guys and Drunk Gaming.

Name: Zapp's Spaceship of Love: Critical Fail!
Description: Do you like D&D? Do you hate D&D? Do you not care either way and just see a bunch of nerds embarrass themselves? Come join the Spaceship of Love crew as they take you through an interactive adventure!

Name: Zumba u'sba
Description: Join members of u'sical Rush as we dance along to many different J-Pop songs. A fun way to mix exercise and Japanese music together!
